exceptions.tactic: apply is_derive_n_ext_loc with (l := sum_n (fun j : nat => Derive_n (f j) k x) n).
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable f.

In environment n : nat f : nat -> R -> R k : nat x : R H : locally x (fun t : R_UniformSpace => forall l j : nat, (l <= n)%nat -> (j <= k)%nat -> ex_derive_n (f l) j t) Unable to unify "match ?M2366 with | 0%nat => True | S n => ex_derive (Derive_n (fun y : R => sum_n_m (fun j : nat => ?M2365 j y) ?M2363 ?M2364) n) ?M2367 end" with "match k with | 0%nat => (fun y : R => sum_n (fun j : nat => f j y) n) x = sum_n (fun j : nat => Derive_n (f j) k x) n | S n0 => is_derive (Derive_n (fun y : R => sum_n (fun j : nat => f j y) n) n0) x (sum_n (fun j : nat => Derive_n (f j) k x) n) end".

original: intros. intros Hlocally. apply is_derive_n_ext_loc with (l := sum_n (fun j : nat => Derive_n (f j) k x) n). - intros. eapply ex_derive_n_sum_n_m. apply Hlocally. lia. lia. - apply Derive_n_sum_n_m. apply Hlocally.
